PrecisAmendments to the CANADA MINING REGULATIONS which are designed to reduce the cost of government operations, make processing applications faster and reduce paperwork for individual prospectors, the mining industry and government, and in addition, will increase fees for identification tags from $1.00 to $2.00 per set, and revise some forms.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 1997-0117 Publication Date: 1997-03-05
